section.text: *NOTE: This section was created by emergency legislation that will expire on January 21, 2026.*
section.heading: Refund of erroneously paid fees.
section.text: The Mayor may refund any license fee or tax, or portion thereof, erroneously paid or collected under this chapter.
section.codify:annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of § 47-2851.25, see § 47-2851.25 of Revised Business Licensing Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-165, Oct. 23, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
For temporary (90 days) creation of this section, see § 47-2851.25 of Revised Business Licensing Reform Emergency Amendment Act of 2025 (D.C. Act 26-165, Oct. 23, 2025, 0 DCR 0).
